insert into amp_modules_visibility (id, name, haslevel, parent) select nextval('amp_modules_visibility_seq'), '/Reporting/Activity Preview', true, (select id from amp_modules_visibility where name = 'REPORTING') where not exists(select 1 from amp_modules_visibility where name = '/Reporting/Activity Preview' and parent = (select id from amp_modules_visibility where name = 'REPORTING'));
insert into amp_modules_visibility (id, name, haslevel, parent) values (nextval('amp_modules_visibility_seq'), '/REPORTING/Activity Preview/Hide Documents if no donor', true, (select id from amp_modules_visibility where name = 'Activity Preview' and parent = (select id from amp_modules_visibility where name = 'REPORTING')));
